👨‍⚕️ Career Summary

Health Informatics graduate (M.S., Indiana University) with a Pharm.D background and strong experience in clinical data analysis, EMR systems, and healthcare analytics. Skilled in applying SQL, Python, Power BI, and interoperability standards (ICD-11, HL7, FHIR) to solve real-world healthcare problems.

💼 Experience Highlights

GTechnologies Pty Ltd – Healthcare Data Analyst
